hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Purple Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Ganon's Castle Small Key# can be found in #Goron City#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #4# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #hearts#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Boomerang# can be found in #Goron City#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Ice Arrows#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path of #hearts#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #hearts#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Purple Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #the Fire Arrows#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #5# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that Anju needs to stop losing her chickens.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: Plandomizer is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be... unnatural.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
